Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ClientObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class Cli extends ClientObservable implements View
The command line interface implementation of the game. This class is observed by the ClientController. Cli communicates with the controller only with update() and it's a controller's job to communicate with server via network
